DOC.brief_summary: A randomize control study compare effect administration 1 gm ceftriaxone elective cesarean section 30-60 min skin incision versus cord clamping .
DOC.detailed_description: compare effect administration 1 gm ceftriaxone elective cesarean section 30-60 min skin incision versus cord clamping.on post-cesarean section infection ( wound infection primary outcome )
